title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
ose not to attack him, and give him a chance to explain, you will still have the option to separate from him after he asks for your trust.

I do. I believe you. You tried to bite me. how can I trust you? Leave. If I ever see you again, I'll kill you.

You can choose to believe him if you want to keep your relationship.

As you continue to venture through each location while progressing through the Main Quests, you may encounter Gandrel, a Gur and a monster hunter can be found at Sunlit Wetlands.
